price: 43. Et si Nous le voulions, Nous les noierions. Nul ne pourrait venir à leur secours et ils ne seraient pas sauvés.
arabic: وَإِن نَّشَأۡ نُغۡرِقۡهُمۡ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنقَذُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-in nasha nugh'riq'hum falā ṣarīkha lahum walā hum yunqadhūna
translations: (would be) a responder to a cry
